properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 9:25AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Gainesville
Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam...

.Rises continue along the Tombigbee River...and a flood warning
remains in effect along the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:15 AM Wednesday the stage was 79.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 68 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 84.9 feet by
Sunday morning and then begin falling slowly.
* Impact...At 84 feet...Some industrial and residential flooding
begins just upstream from Demopolis Dam at 88 feet. Widespread
flooding in Greene...Marengo...and Sumter counties occurs and some
evacuations may be necessary. Widespread flooding of lowlands...
including camps and secondary roads...will continue the next
several days.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
